AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: recruit
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As just a lowly recruit, [PAWN_nameDef] was given many tasks, such as fletching arrows, and patching up holes in leather armour. Of course this was all in between endless training exercises. [PAWN_nameDef] just wanted to shoot an Altmer.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: soldier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a regular soldier in the Maormeri army, seemingly endlessly stationed at one of the barracks on Pyandonea, eagerly awaiting for the next attempt at invading Summerset.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] always enjoyed the calm of going out into the wilderness, and tracking one of the beasts found there. Pyandonea was home to some strange creatures, and while [PAWN_nameDef] was never scared, the thought of encountering a lizard bull did make [PAWN_objective] nervous.
